price: 8. Ir prisimink savo Viešpaties vardą, ir atsiduok Jam (visišku) atsidavimu.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
